name: Vanta
description: Vanta automates and simplifies the complex, time-consuming and tedious process of becoming SOC 2-, HIPAA- or ISO 27001-compliant. It integrates and monitors tools and infrastructure, creates to-do lists for gaps, summarizes results, and connects users with a trained auditor.
why_partnered: Christina was a one-of-a-kind CEO building a category-defining company. Vanta had a sharp wedge into the security and compliance market, delivering the fastest and easiest way for companies to get SOC 2 compliant. The business traction and product strength was strong. That along with Christina’s vision for Vanta’s future made us true believers.
